- Location: Central Row
- Date: Titus or Domitian
- [Hieroglyphic Text](https://www.ifao.egnet.net/uploads/publications/enligne/Temples-Esna004.pdf#page=83){target="_blank"}  
  
**Labels to the giant winged sundisk**  
  
**a**  
<div class="col2">

*nb Msn *  
*nṯr ʿȝ nb p.t*  
*zȝb-šw.ty*   
*pr m ȝḫ.t*  
*ḫnty ỉtr.ty mḥw*  
*dỉ(.w) ʿnḫ*  
  
Lord of Mesen,  
great god, lord of heaven,  
dappled of plumage,  
who emerges from the Akhet,   
foremost of the dual chapels of Lower Egypt,  
given life.
 
</div>

**b**  
<div class="col2">

*Bḥdty*  
*nṯr ʿȝ nb p.t*  
*zȝb-šw.ty*   
*pr m ȝḫ.t*  
*ḫnty ỉtr.ty šmʿ*  
*dỉ(.w) ʿnḫ*  
  
He of Behdet,  
great god, lord of heaven,  
dappled of plumage,  
who emerges from the Akhet,   
foremost of the dual chapels of Upper Egypt,  
given life.
 
</div>
